resources.string: A free service that uses an advanced risk analysis engine to protect your app from malicious traffic,spam and other abusive actions
Api to determine whether a particular URL has been classified by Google as a known threat.
API allow your app to interact programmatically with Google Play Protect feature on a device protecting the device against potentially harmful apps.
Helps you assets the security and compatibility of the Android Environments in whitch your apps run. you can use this API to analyze devices that have installed your app .
